title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti in salted boiling water.
Drain spaghetti and mix with pancetta.
Remove from heat, add egg mixture, and stir until creamy.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices overnight.
Grill or pan fry chicken until cooked.
Cook onions and tomato puree in a pan.
Add chicken to sauce and cook for 10 mins.
